name: KARTHIK BIBIREDDY
headline: Senior Software Engineer | Aspiring Quantitative Developer
professionalSummary: Experienced software engineer with 8+ years of hands-on expertise building distributed systems, scalable APIs, and data-intensive applications across Amazon and multiple startups. Proven track record of delivering high-performance backend systems, cloud-native architectures, and developer productivity tools. Strong foundation in computer science, systems design, and cloud platforms (AWS/GCP). Passionate about solving complex engineering problems and exploring data-driven technologies, including applications in finance.

workExperience.title: Software Development Engineer II
description: Led the org-wide initiative to diversify AWS server footprint by migrating cloud resources from the DUB region to ZAZ, reducing DUB usage by 8%.
Improved system resilience and disaster recovery posture by distributing workloads across geographically diverse AWS regions.
Enhanced quality and reliability of list price validation guardrails by integrating with higher-fidelity data sources.
Collaborated with data owners to define and enforce robust SLAs, driving operational excellence in price accuracy pipelines.
Identified key pain points in debugging workflows across teams through stakeholder interviews and on-call reviews.
Coached an intern to design and deliver a developer-focused troubleshooting tool, cutting on-call load by 5%.
Led development of Alexa personalization features that enabled voice-based learning of user preferences on shared devices.
Enhanced Alexa's in-car prompting capabilities to support more intuitive voice interactions and contextual responses.
At Quattro, led development of a messaging backend for vehicle HUDs to sync contacts and messages when phones are connected.
Enabled reading and composing SMS/MMS messages directly from the car HUD through voice and touch interaction, integrated with Alexa.

workExperience.title: Software Engineer
description: Integrated computer vision models into secure and performant front-end web and desktop apps.
Designed microservices and REST APIs using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, CloudFormation, and DynamoDB.
Managed model inference infrastructure on EC2, ensuring performance optimization and secure deployment.
Enhanced system modularity and fault tolerance across distributed ML services.
Delivered reliable, customer-facing applications across various industries.

workExperience.title: Software Engineer
description: Led end-to-end development of aerospace software solutions, from requirements to deployment.
Designed geolocation 3D mapping and ASDB-based aircraft tracking for ground control stations.
Built real-time Primary Flight Display (PFD) systems enabling in-flight monitoring and decision-making.
Developed internal APIs and tools to manage and scale the open-source avionics project, Airliner.
Transformed ground station UI into a modular multi-window system, enhancing multi-user workflows.
Ensured high-quality releases via code reviews, on-site acceptance testing, and outdoor flight trials.

workExperience.title: Software Developer Intern
description: Developed customer-facing web apps and machine learning services for energy and finance sectors.
Collaborated with content managers and UI designers to resolve cross-browser and UX issues.
Prototyped NLP tools for data extraction and aggregation pipelines, improving automation efficiency.
Deployed ML-backed APIs to AWS infrastructure and participated in QA and integration testing cycles.

projects.title: Technical Analysis Platform for Financial Markets
description: Building a personal platform to backtest and analyze trading strategies using historical financial data, with event-driven AWS Lambda workflows, ETL pipelines for sentiment and technical analysis, and a React-based dashboard for strategy evaluation and performance tracking.

projects.title: Real Estate Investment Analysis Tool
description: Developed a web-based tool to evaluate real estate investment opportunities by comparing buying vs renting, incorporating inputs like purchase price, interest rate, taxes, and ownership costs to output projected ROI, breakeven points, and overall investment value in a clean, user-friendly interface.
